**Contract Description:**

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) invites interested suppliers to bid on the procurement of Holographic Weapon Sights for the Correctional Service of Canada (CSC).

**Key Contract Details:**

* Contract period: one (1) year with the option to extend by up to two (2) additional one-year periods
* Delivery date: above-mentioned
*desired trade agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement, agreements with Peru, Colombia, Panama, and Korea

**Nature of Requirements:**

This bid solicitation supersedes and cancels previous bid solicitation number 21107-233006/A dated March 22, 2023, with a previous closing date of April 06, 2023. A debriefing session will be provided upon request to bidders who participated in the previous solicitation.

**Requirements:**

* Holographic Weapon Sights must be delivered to the CSC within the specified contract period.
* Bidders must comply with the Green Procurement strategy by using environmentally preferable plastic products and reducing plastic packaging waste.

**Note to Bidders:**

* Bidders must use the epost Connect service to transmit their bid electronically.
* Bidders must refer to Part 2 of the bid solicitation for instructions on bidder qualifications and requirements.
* All questions must be submitted in writing to the Contracting Authority no later than five (5) calendar days before the bid closing date.
